sentences.english: A neighbor gave me a box of zucchinis and cucumbers.
sentences.chinese: 邻居给我一箱义大利菜瓜与黄瓜。

sentences.english: Mix cucumber juice with milk and use it instead of a cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 将黄瓜汁与牛奶调和成洁面乳。

sentences.english: Cucumber downy mildew is a rather serious plant disease damage in every place of world.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜霜霉病是对黄瓜生长发育危害最大的世界性病害。

sentences.english: Cucumber downy mildew is a rather serious plant disease damage in every place of world.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜霜霉病是对黄瓜生长发育危害最大的世界性病害。

sentences.english: I like cucumbers, tender and green.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢绿色水嫩的黄瓜。

sentences.english: Place cucumber, green pepper and onion into a large salad bowl, salt them.
sentences.chinese: 将黄瓜，青椒和洋葱放在大的色拉碗中，加盐腌。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: Rub cucumber slices with 1 tbsp salt.
sentences.chinese: 用1汤匙盐放入黄瓜段里撮匀。

sentences.english: Rinse the cucumber with cold water, and drain on paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 用冷水将黄瓜丁冲净，用餐巾纸吸干净水分。

sentences.english: At the farmer's market I got tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, etm.
sentences.chinese: 我在农贸市场买了些西红柿，黄瓜，小萝卜等小东西。

sentences.english: Two other types of melons include winter melon and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 另外两种瓜类还有冬瓜和黄瓜。

sentences.english: Cucumber Juice is a popular healthy drinks.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜汁是广受欢迎的健康饮品。

sentences.english: Do you want relish and onion on your hamburger?
sentences.chinese: 即要不要夹酸黄瓜等调味料和洋葱。

sentences.english: Puree the cucumber in a blender. Mix in the yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 把黄瓜放入搅拌机打成泥，和酸奶混合在一起。

sentences.english: The cucumbers which did not return green in the experiment were made into sauced or sour and sweet cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 并把不能复绿的原料加工成酱香黄瓜和糖醋黄瓜。

sentences.english: The cucumbers which did not return green in the experiment were made into sauced or sour and sweet cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 并把不能复绿的原料加工成酱香黄瓜和糖醋黄瓜。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
